page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: Home life Pets Blackhead Video/Television Recorder/Players are the latest home entertainment. Gardening is the hobby which has encouraged many people to retire here but they need to grow hedges to protect from the winds.Many tender plants will grow although in winter1984-85 most geraniums were killed.Children enjoy horse riding. A 14 year old boy has a mineature motor cycle and side car which he rides round the farm. One lady has 15 cats. Coal and smokeless fuel is imported for cooking.Most people have a solid fuel cooker which heats house ans water as well.Oil and gas cylinders are also used. Wood stoves burn the dead elms. Micro-wave cookers are popular.
